articles.author: Metro Science Reporter
articles.title: Meteorite that lit up night sky over UK is found in the Cotswolds - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: It has been identified as a rare type of meteorite that has never fallen in Britain before
articles.content:
The meteorite is likely to become known as the Winchcombe meteorite (Credits: PA)
A meteorite that fell from the fireball that lit up the sky over the UK and northern Europe last month has been foun… [+3883 chars]

articles.author: Jess Sharp, news reporter
articles.title: These sea slugs sever their own heads and regenerate new bodies - Sky News
articles.description: Researchers discovered that the heads of young slugs started to feed within just hours of being detached from a body.

articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Archaeology news: Discovery of Galilee boat from Jesus' time proves Bible accurate - claim - Daily Express
articles.description: ARCHAEOLOGICAL discoveries from the Biblical Sea of Galilee have been hailed as definitive proof of the Bible's historical reliability. An expert has now explained how the discovery of the Ancient Galilee Boat validates Christian scripture.
